name: A Conversation With Sandy The Convenience Store Sloth
name_original: A Conversation With Sandy The Convenience Store Sloth
description:
Sandy the convenience store sloth waxes lyrical about navigating the happy holidays in 2021. 

A short visual novel and spiritual successor (kind of) to A Conversation With Professor Bones.

Content warning: low level course language and some talk about anxiety/depression (and the state of the world in general).
